Question: In May 2004, Gallup reported that 89% of the Republican electorate approved of this person.
Hints: In his 2002 State of the Union Address, this person referred to an axis of evil including Iraq, Iran and North Korea.
A few places outside the United States bear this person's name.
On October 3, 2005, this person nominated long time White House Counsel Harriet Miers for O'Connor's position.
